name: Baked Falafel
author: Bette
summary: An easy, yummy way to make falafel. Serve with pita bread and your favorite tzatziki.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, rinsed and drained
directions: Wrap onion in cheese cloth and squeeze out as much moisture as possible
Place garbanzo beans, parsley, garlic, cumin, coriander, salt, and baking soda in a food processor
Process until the mixture is coarsely pureed
Mix garbanzo bean mixture and onion together in a bowl
Stir in the flour and egg
Shape mixture into four large patties and let stand for 15 minutes
Preheat an oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Heat olive oil in a large, oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat
Place the patties in the skillet; cook until golden brown, about 3 minutes on each side
Transfer skillet to the preheated oven and bake until heated through, about 10 minutes
